definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: The priest in the Fermanagh will case in the witness box .
sentences.chinese: 弗马纳的神父站在证人席上陈述。

sentences.english: I was called to the witness box.
Local authorities are now looking into perjury charges against pro-ID board members who apparently lied in depositions and on the witness stand.
sentences.chinese: 显然这些理事会成员在宣示作证时和证人席上撒了谎。

sentences.english: It's time for the witness to take the stand for cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 是证人上证人席接受盘问的时候了。

sentences.english: Alan sits down abruptly in the witness chair next tothe judge
sentences.chinese: 艾伦一屁股坐在了法官席旁边的证人席上。

sentences.english: The witness box was encased in fences.
The rack and torture chamber may not be substituted for the witness chair.
sentences.chinese: 不得用酷刑室取代证人席。

sentences.english: The Nazi leader was floundering in the witness stand.
sentences.chinese: 这位纳粹领袖在证人席上犹如困兽。

sentences.english: An elderly man dressed in faded overalls took the witness stand.
sentences.chinese: 一位穿着褪了色的工作服的老人站到了证人席上。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
grand justice/high court justice/supreme court justice
